rules_text: When Darkness Searcher dies, conjure a card named Shattered Sword Warlock or Seek Answers into your hand. [i](Shattered Sword Warlock is a 0/1 Warlock that costs {B} that gives other copies of itself +1/+1. Seek Answers is an instant that costs {UR} and has “Acquire a noncreature card”)[/i]
